reviewText: Its a nice old Halloween special from my childhood. Its worth the watch for nostalgic sake. But I recommend it to anyone who wants a nice campy Halloween cartoon to watch.
Great series of episodes. I almost forgot about these, and luckily I'm in an "All Grown Up" type of mood right now and wanting to "relive" my youth days when the show was still on.
I enjoy watching a good ghost story. But I don't think it is worth buying when i first watch it.
